abilities: Buff Duration +38% / Damage to Abnormal Status +8%

info: Lynn is only available for creation in Japan, China, Global, and Taiwan versions of MapleStory

build: <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/light-steps.png} tip={Light Steps}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/forest-power-i.png} tip={Forest Power I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-pan.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Pan}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-heal.png} tip={[Focus] Heal}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-1.png} tip={Strike}>

<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/light-leap.png} tip={Light Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-penni.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Penni}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/forest-power-ii.png} tip={Forest Power II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/forest-wind.png} tip={Forest Wind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-2.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-1.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sweep.png} tip={Sweep}>

<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/vitality-affinity.png} tip={Vitality Affinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-paeon.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Paeon}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/forest-power-iii.png} tip={Forest Power III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/natures-providence.png} tip={Nature's Providence}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-3.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/earth-pulverization.png} tip={Earth Pulverization}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-2.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sneak-attack.png} tip={Sneak Attack}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-support-flight.png} tip={[Focus] Support Flight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/purify.png} tip={Purify}>

<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/commune.png} tip={Commune}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/guardians-signet.png} tip={Guardian's Signet}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/forest-power-iv.png} tip={Forest Power IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-heal-boost.png} tip={[Focus] Heal Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/natures-providence-boost.png} tip={Nature's Providence Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-4.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/roar.png} tip={Roar}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-3.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/predators-blow.png} tip={Predator's Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/whirlwind.png} tip={Whirlwind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/mother-natures-touch.png} tip={Mother Nature's Touch}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/support-flight.png} tip={Support Flight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-reinforce.png} tip={Strike - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-extra-strike.png} tip={Strike - Extra Strike}> Strike - Reinforce and Extra Strike_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-reinforce.png} tip={Peck - Reinforce}> Peck - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sneak-attack-reinforce.png} tip={Sneak Attack - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sneak-attack-extra-strike.png} tip={Sneak Attack - Extra Strike}> Sneak Attack - Reinforce and Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-4.png} tip={Strike (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-3.png} tip={Peck (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sneak-attack.png} tip={Sneak Attack (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/earth-pulverization.png} tip={Earth Pulverization and Roar (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sweep.png} tip={Sweep and Whirlwind (2nd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/predators-blow.png} tip={Predator's Blow and Raid (4th Job / Hyper Skill)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Lynn Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Focus Skills & Spirit Guide Skills
content: While Lynn is in a party, they can select a party member as a "Focal Target" which skills labelled as [Focus] will affect. If Lynn is not in a party or is in a party by themselves, they will be the Focal Target. Using the Beginner Skill <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus.png} tip={[Focus] (Beginner Skill)}> [Focus], Lynn can choose who the Focal Target is
Below is a list of all Focus Skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-heal.png} tip={[Focus] Heal (1st Job)}> Heal [1st Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-support-flight.png} tip={[Focus] Support Flight (3rd Job)}> Support Flight [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-forest-protection.png} tip={[Focus] Forest Protection (Hyper Skill)}> Forest Protection  [Hyper Skill]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-awaken.png} tip={[Focus] Awaken (5th Job)}> Awaken [5th Job]_>
<em text={Focal Target cannot be yourself for}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/focus-support-flight.png} tip={[Focus] Support Flight (3rd Job)}>
Lynn's attacks can be categorized by their Spirit Guides, Pan, Penni, and Paeon. Each Spirit Guide provides a stacking %Final Damage (additively) buff whenever their attacks successfully hit an enemy
Below is a list of all <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-pan.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Pan (1st Job)}> Pan attacks:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-4.png} tip={Strike (1st Job)}> Strike [1st Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/earth-pulverization.png} tip={Earth Pulverization (3rd Job)}> Earth Pulverization [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/roar.png} tip={Roar (4th Job)}> Roar [4th Job]_>
Below is a list of all <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-penni.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Penni (2nd Job)}> Penni attacks:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-3.png} tip={Peck (2nd Job)}> Peck [2nd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sweep.png} tip={Sweep (2nd Job)}> Sweep [2nd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/whirlwind.png} tip={Whirlwind (4th Job)}> Whirlwind [4th Job]_>
Below is a list of all <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-paeon.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Paeon (3rd Job)}> Paeon attacks:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sneak-attack.png} tip={Sneak Attack (3rd Job)}> Sneak Attack [3rd Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/predators-blow.png} tip={Predator's Blow (4th Job)}> Predator's Blow [4th Job]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/raid.png} tip={Raid (Hyper Skill)}> Raid [Hyper Skill]_<tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/beasts-rage.png} tip={Beast's Rage (5th Job)}> Beast's Rage [5th Job]_>

primary.name: Forest Kiss
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Move back to the Forest Spring.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Lynn storyline

primary.name: [Focus]
primary.shortDesc: Each use of Focus cycles the Focal Target to the next party member.\nHolding the Down key while using Focus will cycle the Focal Target to the previous party member instead.\nWhen not in a party, you are always the Focal Target
primary.desc: Select a Focal Target that Focus Skills will affect
details: [Skill Key]: Selects the next party member as the Focal Target
[Down Arrow Key + Skill Key]: Selects the previous party member as the Focal Target
When not in a party, you are the Focal Target

primary.name: Accompany
primary.shortDesc: Hides the appearance of the current Spirit Guides following Lynn.\nCooldown: 10 sec.

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Lynn storyline
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: Pan swings forward

primary.name: [Focus] Heal
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 18, the current Focal Target recovers 20% of Max HP every second for 40 sec
Resonant: You gain Resonant: Heal when the skill is used on the Focal Target.
Resonant: Heal: Recovers 15% of Max HP every second for 30 sec
Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Provide a periodic healing buff to the Focal Target
details: [Resonant: Heal]: When Focal Target is not self, grants yourself a weaker periodic healing buff

primary.name: Light Steps
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Forest Power I
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +20%, INT: +10, Magic ATT: +5\n85% of damage taken drains MP instead of HP.
primary.desc: A portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP (excluding %Max HP damage)
details: Additionally, increases %Weapon Mastery and grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: Spirit Guide Unity: Pan
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +100, Ignore Defense: +10%\nDamage Taken: -15%\nUpon using a Pan skill on an enemy - Final Damage: +5%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks using Pan skills grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (max 3 stacks, additively)
details: Additionally, grants flat Defense, increases %Ignore Defense, and reduces damage taken (excluding %Max HP damage)

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 5
details: This version replaces the 1st Job version
Increases Max Enemies Hit, %Damage, and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Sweep
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 60%, Number of Attacks: 3, moves in the designated direction.\nExpends 1 charge upon use, gain 1 charge every 5.0 sec, Max Charges: 5
primary.desc: Dash forward damaging enemies in your path
details: Pressing the Up or Down Arrow Keys and Skill Key together will dash diagonally in the given direction
Skill is prepared every 5 sec (up to 5 charges)

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Penni automatically attacks enemies - Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 4
primary.desc: While toggled, Penni seeks and attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Light Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7. Allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Vertical jump skill
details: Can be assigned to a Key Slot or activated while on the ground by pressing the Up Key and Jump Key together

primary.name: Forest Power II
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +50%, INT: +20, Magic ATT: +10
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: Spirit Guide Unity: Penni
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Speed: +20, Max Speed: +15, Jump: +20\nUpon using a Penni skill on an enemy - Final Damage: +5%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Successful attacks using Penni skills grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (max 3 stacks, additively)
details: Additionally, increases %Crit Rate and grants flat Speed, Max Speed, and Jump

primary.name: Forest Wind
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +10, MP: +120 per level, Max MP: +20%\nPassive Effects: Upon using a magic attack - 24% chance to absorb 8% of Max MP\nAbsorb 5% of Max MP from bosses
primary.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Additionally, increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages), %Max MP, and grants flat INT and MP per character level
Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 5
details: This version replaces the 2nd Job version
Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Earth Pulverization
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Max enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 12
After attacking, a burning fissure is created at the attack location for 30 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 10%, Number of Attacks: 5, Duration: every 1 sec
Cooldown: 30 sec
Burning Fissure - Normal Monster Damage: +1250% (additive)
primary.desc: Pan smashes the ground creating a lingering Burning Fissure that damages enemies within it
details: Burning Fissure deals increased damage to regular monsters
Burning Fissure is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Automatically overwritten when a better version is learned via Job Advancement. Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCan be toggled On/Off
details: This version replaces the 2nd Job version
Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks

primary.name: [Focus] Support Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Cooldown: 20 sec\nInstantly moves you to the current Focal Target's location or vice versa.\nCannot use if the Focal Target is too far away
details: [Skill Key]: Teleport to Focal Target
[Down Arrow Key + Skill Key]: Teleport the Focal Target to your location
Focal Target cannot be yourself
Cannot be used if Focal Target is too far away

primary.name: Sneak Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 140. Upon skill use, Paeon prepares to attack. Then, if another Spirit Guide skill damages an enemy, Paeon will attack the same enemy. Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 680%, Number of Follow-up Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 2 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, upon successful Pan or Penni attacks, Paeon deals an additional attack to the same target
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Purify
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60. Purifies nearby allies for 20 sec.\nPurified allies lose 1 harmful effect every 2 sec, up to 5 total effects.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Cast a buff that periodically cures affected party members of Abnormal Statuses (up to 5 statuses)

primary.name: Nature's Providence
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Duration: 90 sec. All party members - Ignore Defense: +30%

primary.name: Forest Power III
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +60%, INT: +20, Magic Attack: +10
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: Spirit Guide Unity: Paeon
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +50%, Critical Damage: +30%, Boss Damage: +35%, Attack Speed: +1\nUpon using a Paeon skill on an enemy - Final Damage: +5%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks using Paeon skills grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (max 3 stacks, additively)
details: Additionally, increases %Crit Rate, %Crit Damage, %Boss Damage, and Attack Speed (by 1 stage)

primary.name: Vitality Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Status Resistance: +16, Elemental Resistance: +16%, Defense: +320, Knockback Resistance: +50%

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: This version replaces the 3rd Job version
Increases Max Enemies Hit, %Damage, and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Roar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 520%, Number of Attacks: 10, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Pan roars damaging nearby enemies

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 450, Penni automatically attacks enemies - Damage: 818%, Number of attacks: 6
details: This version replaces the 3rd Job version
Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Whirlwind
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60. You move back, and deal 580% damage to up to 12 enemies in front of you 4 times. Holding the skill allows you to float for up to 3 sec\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Teleport backwards and releases a gust of wind forward damaging enemies
details: Holding down the Skill Key will cause you to float briefly

primary.name: Support Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300. Teleports all party members on the current map to your location\nCooldown: 30 sec

primary.name: Predator's Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1050%, Number of Attacks: 7.\nEnemies hit take 10% additional damage for 40 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Paeon pounces at nearby targets dealing damage and applying a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage
Can only be used when enemies are nearby
Prioritizes enemies with the highest Max HP

primary.name: Mother Nature's Touch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Affects all party members on the same map - Removes all harmful effects, immediately restores 100% of Max HP, heals 10% HP every second for 30 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Upon casting, cures all party members of Abnormal Statuses and restores %Max HP
details: After casting, grants party members a buff that periodically restores %Max HP

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs

primary.name: Forest Power IV
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +70%, INT: +30, Magic ATT: +30
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: [Focus] Heal Boost
primary.shortDesc: Focal Target - Increased healing: +10%, Attack Power: +10, Magic ATT: +10
details: Increases amount healed
Now grants affected Focal Target flat Attack and Magic Attack

primary.name: Nature's Providence Boost
primary.shortDesc: Nature's Providence - Item Drop Rate +10%
details: Now additionally increases %Item Drop Rate

primary.name: Guardian's Signet
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +60%

primary.name: Commune
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Magic ATT by 50, Buff Duration by 50%, Knockback Resistance by 50%, and Damage by 30%

hyperActive.name: [Focus] Forest Protection
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 600. Creates a protective zone at the location of the current Focal Target for 40 sec, grants a Damage Reduction and Fatal Damage Negation buff to all party members within the protective zone
Damage Reduction: Reduces damage taken by 30% (including percentage HP attacks)
Fatal Damage Negation: Protects from one KO
Party members that receive Fatal Damage Negation cannot receive it again for 300 sec.
Resonant: You gain Resonant: Heal when the skill is used on the Focal Target.
Resonant: Forest Protection: Reduces damage taken, including from attacks based on Max HP, by 20% for 20 sec
(The damage taken reduction does not stack with Forest Protection's damage taken reduction. Only the higher value between the two effects will apply.)
Cooldown: 300 sec
hyperActive.desc: Create a protective barrier at the location of the Focal Target where party members inside it gain a buff
details: [Buff]: Reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks and protects allies from one KO<bp_After the Fatal Damage Negation buff, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time_>

[Resonant: Forest Protection]: When Focal Target is not self, grants yourself [Resonant: Heal] and a weaker version of the damage reduction buff<bp_The barrier's damage taken reduction is prioritized over Resonant version_>

hyperActive.name: Raid
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1780%, Number of Attacks: 12\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Paeon dashes forward leaving behind a trail of slashes

hyperActive.name: Aura of Destiny
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Jianghu jobs in the party.

fifthMain.name: Beast's Rage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000. Summons Paeon in front of you. Paeon Activations: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1920%, Number of Attacks: 12, Duration: 6 sec, Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon Paeon creating a large damaging field of slashing attacks
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Beak Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Duration: 20 sec, Peck becomes Beak Strike, increasaing attack interval for 0.4 sec, increasing damage by 115% (additive), and can attack up to 12 enemies 7 times, Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhances <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-1.png} tip={Peck (2nd Job)}> resulting in a stronger attack that damages nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: [Focus] Awaken
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1300, grants +10% Final Damage to the Focal Target for 20 sec, which scales based on your INT stat.
However, if there are less than 2 party members (including yourself), the Final Damage increase is halved by 50%.
(Final Damage increases by 1% per 2000 INT, up to 60%)
Resonant: When used on the Focal Target, you gain the Resonant Awaken effect.
Resonant Awaken: Increase your Final Damage by 10%, which scales based on your INT stat.
(Final Damage increases by 1% per 2000 INT, up to 30%)
After using the skill, all party members gain Exhaust for 20 sec.
Exhaust: Prevents the use of Awaken if you or the Focal Target have the Exhaust effect
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, grants a %Final Damage (increases by +1% for every 2000 INT, up to 60%) buff to Focal Target and "Exhaust" to all party members
details: Skill has different effects depending on:<bp_[Two or more party members]: When Focal Target is not yourself, grants you [Resonant: Awaken] that increases %Final Damage (increases by 1% per 2000 INT, up to 30%)_[One or fewer party members]: Reduces amount of %Final Damage granted by skill by 50%_>
[Exhaust]: Cannot receive the effects of Awaken again for a set time
Does not stack with Bishop's <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/benediction.png} tip={Benediction (5th Job, Bishop)}> Benediction<bp_Awaken's effects are always prioritized_>

fifthMain.name: Nature's Grace
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500. Immediately restores 100% of Max HP to all party members, grants you the [Excess Healing] effect for 20 sec
[Excess Healing]: Your healing can now restore up to 200% of Max HP instead of the usual 100%, helaing that exceeds the usual 100% amount becomes a shield
The shield disappears when the [Excess Healing] effect ends
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, restores %Max HP and grants all party members the buff 'Excess Healing'
details: [Excess Healing]: Healing from caster that exceeds Max HP becomes a shield

details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Sneak Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Earth Pulverization and Roar Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Earth Pulverization and Roar Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Sweep and Whirlwind Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Predator's Blow and Raid Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Predator's Blow and Raid Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/strike-1.png} tip={Strike (1st Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Strike
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 485%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/sneak-attack.png} tip={Sneak Attack (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/predators-blow.png} tip={Predator's Blow and Raid (4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Sneak Attack
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 170, Spirit Guide [Paeon] prepares a powerful sneak attack. If another Spirit Guide skill deals damage to the enemy, Spirit Guide [Paeon] uses his sneak attack on that enemy to deal 1280% damage to up to 6 enemies nearby, an additional 8 times.\nHEXA Sneak Attack Cooldown: 2 sec.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Raid
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 260, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 2880%, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 30 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/jianghu/lynn/peck-3.png} tip={Peck (2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Peck
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 510, Penni automatically attacks enemies - Damage: 1600%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: No V Matrix requirements are needed to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA [Focus] Heal
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, the current Focal Target recovers 20% of Max HP every second for 70 sec
Resonant: You gain Resonant: HEXA Heal when the skill is used on the Focal Target.
Resonant: HEXA Heal: Recovers 15% of Max HP every second for 50 sec
Cooldown: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA [Focus] Forest Protection
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 690. Creates a protective zone at the location of the current Focal Target for 40 sec, grants a damage reduction and Fatal Damage Negation buff to all party members within the protective zone
Damage Reduction: Reduces damage taken by 35% (including percentage HP attacks)
Fatal Damage Negation: Protects from one KO
Party Members that receive Fatal Damage Negation cannot receive it again for 240 sec.
Resonant: You gain Resonant: HEXA Forest Protection when the skill is used on the Focal Target.
Resonant: HEXA Forest Protection: Damage taken, including attacks that deal damage proportional to Max HP, is reduced by 25% for 20 sec
(The damage taken reduction does not stack with Forest Protection's damage taken reduction. Only the higher value between the two effects will apply.)
Cooldown: 240 sec
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Mother Nature's Touch
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 260. Affects all party members on the same map - Removes all harmful effects, immediately restores 100% of Max HP, heals 10% HP every second for 30 sec, grants Damage Reduction.\nDamage Reduction: Reduces damage taken by 10% (including percentage HP attacks)\nCooldown: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

skillCore.name: Source Flow
skillCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1500, Invincible during casting\nMax Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1080%, Number of Attacks: 12, Spirit Guide Activations: 54\nCooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: [Focus] Awaken Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Using [Focus] Awaken increases the Focal Target's Final Damage by an additional 15%, increases Resonant: Awaken Final Damage by an additional 15%\nPassive Effect - All Stats: +90

boostCore.name: Nature's Grace Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Immediate Healing increased to 110%, [Excess Healing] increased to 210% of Max HP, Duration increased to 25 sec\nPassive Effect - All Stats: +90

meta: Lynn is an INT mage class part of the Jianghu. Lynn utilize Memorial Staff as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Lynn can equip Leaves and Shields
